Feature.Description: This is a test feature to generically test observable properties. It specifies various observable properties and returns defined answers to validate against. We provide three different properties for testing concurrent situations. The Server should iterate 1000 times (to produce some load) and return the current count as Integer. By that we produce an predictable output/return which could be easily tested.

Property.Description: Observable Property iteration no. 1, running 1000 times and returning the current count as intermediate result.
